content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good to meet you, Hassan. Thank you for showing interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I am looking for the best possible rental price to maximize my gains. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of $2,000 per month. Is that something you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. I can accept the rental price of 2000 Euros. I agree to the price of 2000 Euros.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of 2000 Euros per month. I am happy to have you as a tenant in my apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know. Thank you again for choosing my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine. I would like to negotiate further. Can we agree on a rental price of 1800 Euros per month?

I am also interested in learning more about any additional fees or costs that I should be aware of.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Hassan. I understand that you would like to negotiate further on the rental price. However, I am not willing to lower the price further as it would not be financially viable for me as a landlord.

As for any additional fees or costs, I would like to clarify that the rental price of 1800 Euros per month does not include any utilities or other expenses. You would be responsible for paying for your own utilities and any other costs associated with living in the apartment.

I appreciate your interest in the apartment and hope that you will still consider it as your home in New York. Thank you for your understanding and best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
